com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.interaction

Class DwParticleDestroyer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomasdiewald.liquidfun.java.interaction.DwParticleDestroyer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DwInteractionEvent

    public class DwParticleDestroyer
extends Object
implements DwInteractionEvent
    Class that handles mouse-interaction with Box2D/LiquidFun Particles.
    Author:
    Thomas Diewald
